productShortDesc: This minimalist, lightweight formula hydrates all skin typologies, including sensitive, without leaving a greasy residue.This body cream is ideal for all skin typologies, especially sensitive. Apply body cream every morning and evening evenly over your entire body. Massage gently in circular motions until fully absorbed. Dermatologically tested. 99% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.
productIngredients:
Vegetable glycerin:
derived from rapeseeds and sunflower seeds, glycerin captures moisture from the air and provides hydration to your skin.
Purified water:
works as a solvent for blending ingredients together in a formula. It's been purified to eliminate all traces of bacteria.
Caprylic/Capric triglyceride:
originating from plant sources, capric triglyceride leaves a soft touch on the skin.
Behenyl alcohol:
derived from rapeseed to give texture to the cream.
6. Glyceryl stearate:
emulsifier of plant origin to allow the formula to remain stable over time.
Pentylene glycol:
derived from sugar cane, pentylene glycol provides surface layer hydration to the skin.
Citric acid:
derived from the fermentation of corn, citric acid stabilizes the pH of the formula to avoid irritating the skin.
Polyglyceryl-3 methylglucose distearate:
this plant-derived ingredient blends the oily and aqueous phases of the formula together.
O-cymen-5-ol:
a preservative that prevents the development of bacteria.
